message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. It's a good start, and we can work from there.
Alice, your offer was a bit harsh! Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the value decreases with each round.
Okay, I understand your point about inflation.  Let's split it 60/40.  I'm willing to compromise, but we can't keep going back and forth forever.
